title: Forsale 1860-70's CDV of Generals with Doubleday
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Forsale 1860-70's CDV of Generals with Doubleday
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jim Manos
Really cool piece has all 100 generals identified on the back of the cdv with double day as #55. On front has head shots of all 100 Admirals and/or Generals with the number under there head shot which is then identified on the reverse. Other high profile names are Burnside, Foote,Hunter,Grant,Blair etc... CDV is vg condition and cheap at $225 dollars.
